name: Great Greed
overview: Hot Hand-To-Hand Combat! Great Greed whisks you to a world wracked in turmoil. Bio-Hazard Harry is out to pollute a new planet. As Sierra Sam it's up to you to stop him and save the Greene Kingdom. Battle battalions of monsters with a unique interactive fighting system. Great Greed's active combat control puts you in command. Blast off devastating spells with the touch of a button. Hack and dodge! It's all in your hands. -Innovative hand-to-hand combat system! -Seven countries to explore! -Over 20 scorching spells! -Interact with hundreds of characters! -Hours of awesome role playing adventure!
